main.se450.factories

Class JSONFileShapeListFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.se450.factories.JSONFileShapeListFactory

  • public class JSONFileShapeListFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The JSONFileShapeListFactory is a factory pattern that offers a less cohesive way of extracting data from the JSON file.
    Author:
    anthonyfreunde

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • makeShape

        public static java.util.ArrayList<IShape> makeShape(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                    java.awt.Dimension dimension)
        The makeShape method extracts shape data from the JSON file to create an a new instance of type IShape.

        • Circle
        • Line
        • Ship
        • Square
        • Triangle

        The shapes are created by using the IShape interface for encapsulation and by implementing another factory pattern through the ShapeFactory class. The ShapeFactory returns a shape of type IShape and adds the shape to an ArrayList.

        Should a bad shape be passed, it will catch the exception and move on to the next shape in the JSON file.

        Returns iShapes ArrayList containing all of the eligible shapes extracted from the JSON file.

        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file from which to read in shape data
        dimension - of type Dimension encapsulating height and width of a component.
        Returns:
        The iShapes ArrayList containing all of the shapes extracted from the JSON file and their attributes.
        See Also:
        Dimension, ShapeFactory, IShape
